title: The Breakers are one win away from the Australian basketball league finals after beating Tasmania 88 - 68 in their first semi - final play - off game in Auckland - both sides have caught the last flight out of Auckland ahead of Cyclone Gabrielle canc...
body_text:
News | Soccer
14 Feb 2026 20:09
NZCity News
13 February 2023
Golfer Michael Hendry has secured victory at the Victoria Open - he finished at 21-under par to win by four strokes.
The Wellington Phoenix men have again relinquished a lead for the eighth time this season to lose 2-1 to Macarthur FC and stay sixth on goal difference in football's A-League.
The club's women lost 1-nil at Western Sydney - they remain last.
Manchester United have scored twice late to beat Leeds 2-nil in the Premier League.
They're second ahead of Manchester City for now but City are poised to reverse the standings - they're up 3-nil over Aston Villa at halftime.
Patrick Mahomes' reputation faces a test in today's Super Bowl LVII .
His Kansas City Chiefs take on the Philadelphia Eagles in Phoenix, Arizona - with the 27-year-old quarterback looking to get a second Super Bowl victory from three on his record.
North Queensland and NRL league newcomers the Dolphins couldn't be separated over 80 minutes in Cairns as the sides began their pre-season trials with a 22-all draw.
England are on the scoreboard in rugby's Six Nations, bouncing back from last week's home defeat to Scotland with a 31-14 win over Italy at Twickenham.
A communication misunderstanding or brilliant alpha gamesmanship from Nagpur ground staff after Australia lost the first cricket test of the four-match series inside three days to India?
The visitors requested for pitches to stay dry so they could practice before heading to Delhi tomorrow for the second match starting Friday.
They turned up at the ground to find them drenched and unsuited for any use other than a potential pottery class.
Double time trial world champion and Olympic medallist Rohan Dennis has confirmed he will retire from professional cycling at the end of his season - he's 32.
© 2026 Newstalk ZB, NZCity
The Wellington Phoenix men have again relinquished a lead for the eighth time this season to lose 2-1 to Macarthur FC and stay sixth on goal difference in football's A-League.
The club's women lost 1-nil at Western Sydney - they remain last.
Manchester United have scored twice late to beat Leeds 2-nil in the Premier League.
They're second ahead of Manchester City for now but City are poised to reverse the standings - they're up 3-nil over Aston Villa at halftime.
Patrick Mahomes' reputation faces a test in today's Super Bowl LVII .
His Kansas City Chiefs take on the Philadelphia Eagles in Phoenix, Arizona - with the 27-year-old quarterback looking to get a second Super Bowl victory from three on his record.
North Queensland and NRL league newcomers the Dolphins couldn't be separated over 80 minutes in Cairns as the sides began their pre-season trials with a 22-all draw.
England are on the scoreboard in rugby's Six Nations, bouncing back from last week's home defeat to Scotland with a 31-14 win over Italy at Twickenham.
A communication misunderstanding or brilliant alpha gamesmanship from Nagpur ground staff after Australia lost the first cricket test of the four-match series inside three days to India?
The visitors requested for pitches to stay dry so they could practice before heading to Delhi tomorrow for the second match starting Friday.
They turned up at the ground to find them drenched and unsuited for any use other than a potential pottery class.
Double time trial world champion and Olympic medallist Rohan Dennis has confirmed he will retire from professional cycling at the end of his season - he's 32.
